{{{
  private BlobKey getBlobKey(AppEngineFile file) {
   
    BlobKey key = FileServiceFactory.getFileService().getBlobKey(file);
    
    if (key == null && file.getNamePart().contains(":") == true) {
      String[] s = file.getNamePart().split(":");
      if (s != null && s.length == 2) {
        key = new BlobKey(s[1]);
      }
    }
    
    return key;
  }
}}}
